title: Shared Death Experiences - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 1/18/22
itunes:title: Shared Death Experiences - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 1/18/22
description:
George Noory and author William Peters discuss his work studying end of life experiences, how living people may share physical experiences with their loved ones who are close to death, his own out of body experiences, as well as George's strange encounter with a friend who would soon die unexpectedly.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

itunes:summary: A exploration into shared experiences between the dying and their loved ones.
itunes:author: Coast to Coast AM
